p: Information technology has played a key role in Chinaâ€™s response to the COVID-19 outbreak. Information technology was used at all stages of the epidemic, such as prediction of epidemic trends, tracking of close contacts, and remote diagnosis. Based on the health information technology framework for responding to the epidemic described in the Methods section, we present specific health information technology practices for managing the COVID-19 outbreak in China ( Table 1) and describe several health information technologies used to fight COVID-19 in detail.
